**Title:**
Cleaning Services for the High Commission of Canada to India
--------------------------------------------------------

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01007643  
**Amendment Number:** 5  
**Solicitation Number:** 21-186288  
**Publication Date:** 2022-09-21  
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-15T14:00:00
--------------------------------------------------------

**Description:**
The High Commission of Canada in New Delhi, India, and its official residence are seeking a trusted service provider for cleaning services.

**Required Services:**
Daily cleaning services, 7 days a week, are expected to cover approximately 17,250 m² of surface area. Additionally, cleaning services on an as-needed basis may also be required.

**Scope of Work:**
A qualified and experienced contractor will be responsible for providing comprehensive cleaning services, including:

* Qualified manpower and supervision
* Tools and equipment
* Cleaning supplies and consumables
* Personal protective equipment (PPE)
* Transportation to the High Commission compound and the Official Residence

**Qualification Criteria:**
The contractor must demonstrate expertise and a proven track record in providing high-quality cleaning services, adhering to the highest industry standards.
